Package model

Interface Image

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractImage, GrayscaleImage, RGBImage
    public interface Image
    This interface acts as a Model in the Image Manipulation Application and holds all the logic to the operations that can be performed by the user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void blur()
      This method is used to blur the current image.
      void brighten​(int increment)
      This method loops through all pixels in the image, and increases their red, green, and blue values by the given increment parameter.
      int[][] calculateHistogram()
      Calculates the histogram for the image.
      Image combineByIntensity()
      This method is used to combine the channels by the Intensity value of the rgb components.
      Image combineByLuma()
      This method is used to combine the channels by the Luma value of the rgb components.
      Image combineBySepia()
      This method is used to convert an Image to a sepia toned Image.
      Image combineByValue()
      This method is used to combine the channels by the pixel value of the rgb components.
      void combineChannels​(Image[] channels)
      This method is used to combine the 3 channels R, G, B respectively.
      boolean compareImages​(Image updatedImage)
      This method is used to compare 2 images.
      Image dither()
      This method is used to convert an RGB Image to a Dithered Image.
      Image duplicate()
      This method creates a duplicate of the image values by the given decrement parameter.
      void flipHorizontal()
      This method flips the image horizontally by swapping each pixel in a row with its corresponding pixel on the other side of the row.
      void flipVertical()
      This method function flips the image vertically by swapping each pixel in a column with its corresponding pixel on the other side of the column.
      int getHeight()
      This method is used to get the height of the image.
      int getMaxColorValue()
      This method is used to get the maxColorValue of the image.
      Pixel getPixel​(int x, int y)
      This method is used to get the pixel value for a particular row & column.
      int getWidth()
      This method is used to get the width of the image.
      boolean isGrayscale()
      This method is used to check if the given image object is a greyscale image.
      Image load​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      This method is used to load other types of image formats apart from ppm.
      Image load​(java.lang.String content)
      This method helps in loading an image to the application.
      void sharpen()
      This method is used to sharpen the current image.
      Image[] splitChannels()
      Splits the image into 3 channels.
      boolean validateCombineChannels​(Image[] channels)
      This method is used to validate the combined channels.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        Image load​(java.lang.String content)
        This method helps in loading an image to the application.
        Parameters:
        content - represents the extracted content from the ppm file.
        Returns:
        returns an Image object.

      • load

        Image load​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        This method is used to load other types of image formats apart from ppm.
        Parameters:
        image - represents a BufferedImage object.
        Returns:
        returns an Image object.

      • flipHorizontal

        void flipHorizontal()
        This method flips the image horizontally by swapping each pixel in a row with its corresponding pixel on the other side of the row.

      • flipVertical

        void flipVertical()
        This method function flips the image vertically by swapping each pixel in a column with its corresponding pixel on the other side of the column.

      • brighten

        void brighten​(int increment)
        This method loops through all pixels in the image, and increases their red, green, and blue values by the given increment parameter.
        Parameters:
        increment - represents the increment value.

      • duplicate

        Image duplicate()
        This method creates a duplicate of the image values by the given decrement parameter.
        Returns:
        the duplicate image object with current image properties

      • splitChannels

        Image[] splitChannels()
               throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Splits the image into 3 channels.
        Returns:
        returns an array of 3 channels.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if we are trying to split greyscale images.

      • combineChannels

        void combineChannels​(Image[] channels)
              throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        This method is used to combine the 3 channels R, G, B respectively.
        Parameters:
        channels - represents all the r, g, b channels.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - throws this exception when we try combining rgb model.

      • combineByValue

        Image combineByValue()
        This method is used to combine the channels by the pixel value of the rgb components.
        Returns:
        returns a combined image.

      • combineByIntensity

        Image combineByIntensity()
        This method is used to combine the channels by the Intensity value of the rgb components.
        Returns:

      • combineByLuma

        Image combineByLuma()
             throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        This method is used to combine the channels by the Luma value of the rgb components.
        Returns:
        returns the Image object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - is thrown when trying to combine greyscale images.

      • compareImages

        boolean compareImages​(Image updatedImage)
               throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        This method is used to compare 2 images.
        Parameters:
        updatedImage - represents the second image.
        Returns:
        return true if the images are identical and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - is thrown when height and width of the images dont match.

      • validateCombineChannels

        boolean validateCombineChannels​(Image[] channels)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method is used to validate the combined channels.
        Parameters:
        channels - represents the r,g,b channels.
        Returns:
        returns true if validation is successful otherwise returns false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is thrown when there are more channels than supported.

      • isGrayscale

        boolean isGrayscale()
        This method is used to check if the given image object is a greyscale image.
        Returns:
        returns true or false.

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        This method is used to get the width of the image.
        Returns:
        returns the width.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        This method is used to get the height of the image.
        Returns:
        returns the height.

      • getPixel

        Pixel getPixel​(int x,
               int y)
        This method is used to get the pixel value for a particular row & column.
        Parameters:
        x - represents the row.
        y - represents the column.
        Returns:
        returns a pixel object.

      • blur

        void blur()
        This method is used to blur the current image.

      • sharpen

        void sharpen()
        This method is used to sharpen the current image.

      • getMaxColorValue

        int getMaxColorValue()
        This method is used to get the maxColorValue of the image.
        Returns:
        returns the maxColorValue.

      • combineBySepia

        Image combineBySepia()
              throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        This method is used to convert an Image to a sepia toned Image.
        Returns:
        returns the Image object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - is thrown when trying to combine greyscale images.

      • dither

        Image dither()
      throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        This method is used to convert an RGB Image to a Dithered Image.
        Returns:
        returns the Image Object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - is thrown when trying to combine greyscale images.

      • calculateHistogram

        int[][] calculateHistogram()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Calculates the histogram for the image.
        Returns:
        a 2D array of integers representing the histogram
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when histogram operation is no possible.
